name: iterplus
description: The best of Rust/Haskell/Python iterators in Javascript.

scripts.doc: typedoc --options typedoc.json && cp docconfig.yml docs/config.yml && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.magic: npm run gen && npm run deno && npm run format && npm run build && npm test
scripts.full: npm run gen && npm run deno && npm run format && npm run check && npm run build && npm run doc && npm run bundle && npm test

author: Aplet123
